core.game

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.game.Table

  • public class Table
extends Object
    Manages the game table by tracking community cards and the betting pot.

    Responsible for dealing community cards in stages and handling pot operations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Table()
      Constructs a new Table with an empty community and a zeroed pot.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBet(int amount)
      Adds a specified amount of chips to the pot.
      void addCommunityCard(Card card)
      Adds a single card to the community cards on the table.
      void deal(Deck deck)
      Deals community cards from the provided deck according to poker rules: If no cards have been dealt yet, deals three cards (the flop). Otherwise, deals one card (turn or river) until five cards total.
      ArrayList<Card> getCommunityCards()
      Returns the list of community cards currently on the table.
      int getPotAmount()
      Retrieves the current total amount of chips in the pot.
      void reset()
      Resets the table for a new round by clearing all community cards and resetting the pot to zero.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Table

        public Table()
        Constructs a new Table with an empty community and a zeroed pot.

    • Method Detail

      • deal

        public void deal(Deck deck)
        Deals community cards from the provided deck according to poker rules:
        • If no cards have been dealt yet, deals three cards (the flop).
        • Otherwise, deals one card (turn or river) until five cards total.
        Parameters:
        deck - the Deck to draw cards from

      • addCommunityCard

        public void addCommunityCard(Card card)
        Adds a single card to the community cards on the table.
        Parameters:
        card - the Card to add to the community

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the table for a new round by clearing all community cards and resetting the pot to zero.

      • getPotAmount

        public int getPotAmount()
        Retrieves the current total amount of chips in the pot.
        Returns:
        the current pot amount

      • addBet

        public void addBet(int amount)
        Adds a specified amount of chips to the pot.
        Parameters:
        amount - number of chips to add

      • getCommunityCards

        public ArrayList<Card> getCommunityCards()
        Returns the list of community cards currently on the table.
        Returns:
        list of community Card objects
